database.name: VIEW C_PERIODCONTROL_V
database.view: SELECT pc.c_periodcontrol_id AS c_periodcontrol_v_id, pc.ad_client_id, pc.ad_org_id, pc.isactive, pc.created, pc.createdby, pc.updated, pc.updatedby, pc.c_period_id, pc.docbasetype, pc.periodstatus, pc.periodaction, pc.processing, y.c_calendar_id, y.year, p.startdate, p.enddate, p.name FROM c_periodcontrol pc, c_period p, c_year y WHERE pc.c_period_id = p.c_period_id AND p.c_year_id = y.c_year_id
